name: nuxt-lazyload-files
description: Module to allow lazy load specific files, so they're only imported when used (e.g.: screen size related stylings)

scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:beta: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --prerelease && npm publish --tag beta && git push --follow-tags
